definition: to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: The doctor gave the sick boy some medicine.
sentences.chinese: 医生给那个生病的男孩一些内服药。

sentences.english: And this is for external use , not for oral administration .
sentences.chinese: 这是用外用药，不可内服。

sentences.english: Is this for internal use too?
Many medicines are products of catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 很多内服药就是催化反应的产物。

sentences.english: There is no reaction within the medication, patients with fractures of any age can use.
sentences.chinese: 内服药没有反作用，任何年龄段的骨折病人都可运用。

sentences.english: Internally take Hong Hua in a decoction to help with blood stasis and painful menses.
sentences.chinese: 内服红花熬制的药汤，对沉血和痛经有帮助。

sentences.english: Medicines are broadly classed as internal or external ones.
sentences.chinese: 药物分为内服药与外用药两类。

sentences.english: Want to eradicate acne, definitely use the oral collaboration with topical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 想根除痘痘，肯定要用内服协作外用的一同治疗。

sentences.english: To observe the cure effect of needle-knife together with oral taking traditional Chinese drug(TCD)and functional exercise on patella malacia.
sentences.chinese: 观察针刀中药内服配合功能锻炼治疗髌骨软化症疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusion Internal and external medicine in effective for cholelithiasis.
sentences.chinese: 提示中药内服外敷是治疗胆石症的有效方法。

sentences.english: The medicine is for external use, not to drink.
sentences.chinese: 这药是外用的，不可内服。

sentences.english: Besides, those in the study group were orally administrated by medicine for activating blood circulation and eliminating stasis.
sentences.chinese: 实验组采用内服活血化瘀药外擦患处方法进行治疗。

sentences.english: This is for internal use. Two talbets, for times a day.
sentences.chinese: 这是内服药，每次两片，一天四次。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of anti-aging effect of Yangyan Quban particles on the aging skin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨内服养颜祛斑颗粒抗皮肤衰老作用及机制。

sentences.english: Internal and external use of water as a therapeutic treatment for all forms of disease.
sentences.chinese: 水疗法水的外用和内服，作为各种病症的治疗方法。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)
